custom-sql.sql:
SELECT * FROM biobank WHERE (biobank.biobankId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobank.acronym LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$]
(biobank.countryCode = ? OR ? = '')

SELECT COUNT(*) from ( SELECT * FROM biobank WHERE (biobank.biobankId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobank.acronym LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$]
(biobank.countryCode = ? OR ? = '') ) dummy;

SELECT biobank.*, organization_.name, biobankattributelists.biobankAttributeListsId, biobankattributelists.biobankDbId AS ID, biobankattributelists.attributeListName, biobankattributelists.attributeListValue FROM biobank INNER JOIN organization_ ON biobank.biobankDbId = organization_.organizationId LEFT JOIN biobankattributelists ON biobank.biobankDbId = biobankattributelists.biobankDbId WHERE ((organization_.name LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobank.biobankId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobank.acronym LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobankattributelists.attributeListName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobankattributelists.attributeListValue LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobank.countryCode = ? OR ? = '') GROUP BY biobank.biobankDbId

SELECT COUNT(*) from ( SELECT biobank.*, organization_.name, biobankattributelists.biobankAttributeListsId, biobankattributelists.biobankDbId AS ID, biobankattributelists.attributeListName, biobankattributelists.attributeListValue FROM biobank INNER JOIN organization_ ON biobank.biobankDbId = organization_.organizationId LEFT JOIN biobankattributelists ON biobank.biobankDbId = biobankattributelists.biobankDbId WHERE ((organization_.name LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobank.biobankId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobank.acronym LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobankattributelists.attributeListName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobankattributelists.attributeListValue LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (biobank.countryCode = ? OR ? = '') GROUP BY biobank.biobankDbId ) dummy;
